subject.value: In order to activate your account, you must reply to this email

body.value:
Dear  {firstName}:

Thank-you for registering to receive more information on the business you saw on our Business Brokers Website. We look forward to working with you. Below is another copy of the Non-Disclosure Agreement you agreed to online.  To complete the registration process,  You must reply to this email and confirm that you accept the terms of our agreement (copy below). We will activate your account as soon as we receive your reply. You don't need to fill out anything else, just REPLY to this email and we'll set up your account.  

The login credentials below will be activated as soon as you reply to this email.  

User Name: {email}
Password: {c_password}

If you need assistance, contact us at  or call .  Once your account is activated, one of our brokers will be in touch with you to assist in your search for the right business.   

At your service,

Your Support Department

This is your username and password to your online account.
 

User Name: {c_username}
Password: {c_password} 

You can login to your account by going to 

Here is a brief operational overview of your online Portfolio System: When you log in to your online account for the first time, you will see a brief, line-item description of your original
request. Just Click on the Listing to see the financial details and the full description of the business.

 I am available to assist you anytime with your business search.  In the meantime, if you need to get in touch with me, please feel free to do so using the contact information below.
